feed.title: Dawarich Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.26.2
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Seeds are now working properly. #1207
  • Fixed a bug where France flag was not being displayed correctly. #1204
  • Fix blank map page caused by empty default distance unit. Default distance unit is now kilometers and can be changed in Settings -> Maps. #1206

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.26.4
entry.content:
ðŸŽ‰ 5K stars release ðŸŽ‰

Changed

  • Docker image is now using slim image to introduce some memory optimizations.
  • The trip page now looks a bit nicer.
  • The "Yesterday" button on the map page was changed to "Today". #1215
  • The "Create Import" button now disabled until files are uploaded.

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.26.5
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Wget is back to fix healthchecks. #1241 #1231
  • Dockerfile.prod is now using slim image. #1245
  • Dockerfiles now use jemalloc with check for architecture. #1235

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.26.6
entry.content:
Added

  • armv8 to docker build. #1249

Changed

  • Points are now being created in the points queue. #1243
  • Route opacity is now being displayed as percentage in the map settings. #462 #1224
  • Exported GeoJSON file now contains coordinates as floats instead of strings, as per RFC 7946. #762
  • Fog of war now can be set to 200 meter per point. #630

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by Steven B., James Manolios, chenrik, aldumil, derpderpington, Chippie, dint, jhalpern, Lex Fradski, Schlufo, cyberswan.at, craftyklaus, JMyrng, Andre, hogenf, naraxius, Lemur, Embrace, martin4861, Alex, evetters, GregF, Jon Coffee, Lukas, Robbie G, Kilian, Hans G, Chris, tabaha, Andre, Michael C, Chris, elyob, gesus, Jonah B., Dante, MK and Johnathan D on Patreon and KoFi ðŸ’™

What's Changed

  • Bump rubocop-rails from 2.31.0 to 2.32.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1220
  • docker-compose.yml: Add PostGIS envvar to create database on initial setup. by @jivanpal in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1183
  • Update build_and_push.yml by @framesfree in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1202
  • 0.26.6 by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1255
